metadata.description: An exclusive digital download of the comics art book revealing some of the stories set in the world of the alien invasion disaster film, THE DARKEST HOUR. Featuring art and stories from comics superstars such as Ben Templesmith, Becky Cloonan, Jeremy Haun, Brian Hurtt, Tom Fowler, Mateus Santolouco, Rick Spears, and more.
metadata.name: The Darkest Hour
